ygData.subject: RE: another topic
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t mean to be rude, or don t point this at any particular person, but can we keep to the topic of Everquest and Cleric s, and not talk about other games.
ygData.messageBody:
I don't mean to be rude, or don't point this at any particular person, but
can we keep to the topic of Everquest and Cleric's, and not talk about other
games. I didn't think this was a chat room. My email is filling with all
of this non-related material. Thanks

Quandaen
Level 12 High Elf Cleric

-----Original Message-----
From: John Erik Maynus [mailto:jmaynus@...]
Sent: Friday, September 10, 1999 3:33 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] another topic


From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>

You hafta connect through Sonys Station for EQ, so either way you have to go
through a gaming type zone. Maybe AC's is a lot different but by the time
you get to the character select screen on EQ I could've been playing AC for
2-3 mins. Both are good games, everyone whined about how EQ's interface and
all that, AC's seems to be better yet I've read in a few places ppl are
saying it's worse. I don't find AC hard to play at all, it's easy to learn,
have pretty good graphics, gameplay is easy and I think AC feels more like a
real RPG then EQ does on how they handle skills and all that.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************


> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
> Aye, you are correct there. But you will still have to connect to MSN's
> Gaming Zone.com....ahhh!!!! I despise thee MSN!
>
>
>

just

> > Azor
